chunks.lyrics: Album: The Scepter of the Ancients
h - hammer on b - Bend e.g.: 10b(12) = bend 1 tone
, - slight palm mute () - ghost note, sustained note
Tuning D A D G B E (dropped D)
RIFF 2 (play 2x all the boxes)(these are all 8ths triplets)
*Guitar 2 plays a pinched harmonic somewhere on the fretboard (duh)
*NOTE : the seconde time you play the riff, stop at the (*)
Guitar 2 (not sure at all about the second bar):
Then play RIFF 1 with the second box
Then play it with the first box
Then play it with the fourth box
Then play the following BRIDGE once
